themes: the Gatherer / the Queen / the tribal mouth
education of the tribe as power
possessive voice: “I have / I own / I control resources”
integration of outsiders for tribal mutation (45.6)

classical.hd_quote: The ability to promote and develop gathering together through the education of the uncommitted.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Knows power = educate the people, then gather them.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Overzealous promotion feels like proselytizing and repels the tribe.

classical.hd_quote: Gathering together is strengthened by acknowledged common interest.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Projects, “I can lead you,” and cements it with shared material interests.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Rejects others’ techniques; becomes the power-behind-the-throne controller.

classical.hd_quote: The ability when excluded to take whatever measures are necessary to dissolve the antiquated form and to accept even humiliation to achieve inclusion.

keywords: will do anything to get to center
interpretation.behavioral_axis: If barred from power, will find or force a way back in.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Violent or reactive exclusion → tribal fracture.

classical.hd_quote: The ability to focus the opportunity of gathering together for the service of higher principles.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Points the whole tribe’s resources at what truly benefits them.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Uses group direction to advance private agenda.

classical.hd_quote: All gathering must have a center and a focus.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Becomes the obvious material center; leads by educating and delegating.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Assumes respect before it’s earned → appears aristocratic or entitled.

classical.hd_quote: A material direction which serves the outsider; or a material direction that is focused on conditioning the outsider to conform.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Sees tribe must mutate by bringing in new blood/resources.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Brings outsiders in then overcontrols to appease the tribe.
